text: 13.18: Kis 16.35; Nam 14.34; Lo 1.31; Sng 95.10; FG 7.36Ana mben kov, mba gumgi ki fhuv ŋanan kav, ana nduara mben simtɨgi ndiav kim, 40 mpari vhɨzgi. 13.18 Gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe gumgi ki fhuv ŋanen khɨɨnan kav, khaŋ nzuai, “Nza gumgi ki fhuv ŋanen khɨɨnan kim, ana tuituigira nza garav kim, 40 mpari vhɨzgi.”
